ARABIC: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِى ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ هَٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Messenger says, 'My Lord, my people treat this Qur'an as something to be ignored.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The prophet will say: "O my Lord, my people had fettered the Qur'an."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the Messenger will say, "O my Lord, my people had made this Qur'an the object of their ridicule."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Messengers will say, "Lord, my people had abandoned this Quran."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the Noble Messenger submitted, “O my Lord – indeed my people took this Qur’an as worthy of being abandoned.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Messenger will say: "O my Lord! Verily, my people deserted this Qur'an."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the Apostle cried out: O my Lord! surely my people have treated this Quran as a forsaken thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Messenger says, 'O my Lord, behold, my people have taken this Koran as a thing to be shunned.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the messenger saith: O my Lord! Lo! mine own folk make this Qur'an of no account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Messenger will say, "Lord, my people did indeed discard the Quran,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Apostle will say: my lord! verily my people too k this Qur'an as a thing to be shunned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the Apostle will say, ‘O my Lord! Indeed my people consigned this Quran to oblivion.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then the Messenger will say: "O my Lord! Truly my people took this Qur'an for just foolish nonsense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the Messenger (Muhammad SAW) will say: "O my Lord! Verily, my people deserted this Quran (neither listened to it, nor acted on its laws and orders).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Messenger says: 'O my Lord, my people have taken this Koran while deserting it'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the Messenger will say, “My Lord, my people have abandoned this Quran.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur'an as [a thing] abandoned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:30] And the Messenger, Muhammad (s), says, ‘O my Lord, lo! my people, the [tribe of] Quraysh, consider this Qur’ān as something to be shunned’, to be disregarded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (saith: my Lord! Lo! mine own folk make this Qur'an of no account) they speak ill of it, they do not believe in it and do not act upon its teachings.
